title: Growing Potatoes Through the Year | Produce Made Simple

subtasks: Checking equipment for the following year
Ensuring irrigation systems are functioning properly
Managing crops during planting, growth, and harvesting seasons
Performing maintenance tasks during the winter months
Monitoring weather conditions for optimal planting timing
Planting potatoes in April after soil has dried and frost has passed
Irrigating crops during dry periods to promote healthy growth
Harvesting potatoes beginning in August when they mature
Continuing harvest through October
Adjusting to regular hours during winter months with maintenance focus
Timing of crop planting based on soil drying and frost conditions
Initiating irrigation when necessary based on seasonal weather
